article.title: Northrop to Support Radar Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Guidance and Electronics Company Incorporated, Woodland Hills, California, was awarded a firm-fixed-price, sole-source contract with a maximum $6,961,800 to provide support for radar systems. The Defense Logistics Agency Land and Maritime, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
